product_name: DryGuy GreenHeat Rechargeable Hand Warmer - 4400 mAh
long_description: With a high-capacity 4400 mAh battery, this DryGuy GreenHeat Rechargeable Hand Warmer will keep your hands toasty for 4 - 5 hrs., and it can recharge your cell phone or other digital device, too. Charge up the hand warmer from any USB port before you hit the slopes or head out for a walk; it takes 7 - 8 hrs. to fully charge the built-in 4400 mAh lithium-ion battery. Hand warmer operates on high and low settings; high reaches a temperature of approximately 118degF and will run for 3.5 - 4.5 hrs. Low reaches a temperature of approximately 107degF and will run for 4 - 5 hrs. Connect the hand warmer to your smartphone with the included USB/micro USB cable to recharge your phone's battery. Stow the DryGuy GreenHeat Rechargeable Hand Warmer in the included knit sleeve to protect it while you're on the go.
short_description: With a high-capacity 4400 mAh battery, this DryGuy GreenHeat Rechargeable Hand Warmer will keep your hands toasty for 4 - 5 hrs., and it can recharge your cell phone or other digital device, too.
